name: TheGhosty.GitHub.io
tagline: This is George Trickett (TheGhosty)'s GitHub Page!
body:
Hello there! You've found my GitHub page! If you were looking for it congratulations!

If you are here to contact me to discuss my work, please feel free to contact me via my Twitter @GTrick_ I'm very friendly and usually willing to help with any issues/questions you may have.

I am currently looking for a job working in Java(development/design/ect.) (Willing to learn other languages), Web Desgin or Graphics Design I am also looing for work experience or apprenticeship schemes in thoses fields. If you are willing to hire me I'm sure I'll be an asset to your team and will achieve any goals/targets that are set. Please get in touch via my Twitter account mentioned above to discuss the duties and conditions that you have to offer.

Thanks for stopping by!

~TheGhosty
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
